   contain the root `toctree` directive.

PyVCHAM documentation
=====================

This is the official documentation for PyVCHAM, a state-of-the-art Python library for creating Vibronic Coupling Hamiltonians.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   vcham
   examples
   license
